summary: Cybercriminals are selling hundreds of thousands of credential sets stolen with the help of a cracked version of Acunetix, a powerful commercial web app vulnerability scanner, new research finds.  The cracked software is being resold as a cloud-based attack tool by at least two different services, one of which KrebsOnSecurity traced to an information technology firm based in Turkey

summary:
It turns out that all cluster mailboxes in the Denver area have the same master key.  So if someone robs a postal carrier, they can open any mailbox. 
I get that a single master key makes the whole system easier, but it‚Äôs very fragile security...
